title: SEAFORT / DESERTER REASONING
description:
Why did he do it and how it happened.

REACTION (MOT) red check

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: ""Three weeks ago, when the rich hag..."
dialogueTree.text: "Three weeks ago, when the rich hag came in on her galley. Her honour guard came in tow."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Joyce... he means Joyce again."
links.text: Joyce... he means Joyce again.

links.title: You: ""This is the so-called soucriant ag..."
links.text: "This is the so-called soucriant again, right? Joyce?"

links.title: You: ""You mean the Wild Pines representa..."
links.text: "You mean the Wild Pines representative again, right?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Wrinkled up whore," he nods."
links.text: "Wrinkled up whore," he nods.

links.title: You: ""Whore. Good strong word. I use it..."
links.text: "Whore. Good strong word. I use it often myself."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes," he nods enthusiastically. "O..."
links.text: "Yes," he nods enthusiastically. "Old-fashioned."

links.title: You: ""What is it with these *whores* and..."
links.text: "What is it with these *whores* and *pederasts*... aren't you a communist?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Lax sexual morals are a bourgeois..."
links.text: "Lax sexual morals are a bourgeois ploy," he gargles a spit ball. "As to pederasty, the Party legalized it in '04. My Party, not your liberal masters." He spits it out on the dying coals.

links.title: The Deserter: ""So don't you sermonize me, you rac..."
links.text: "So don't you sermonize me, you racist shithole." He adds. "It's still bourgeois when the bourgeois does it. Fiddling with their sexual organs..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Some strange glandular process take..."
links.text: Some strange glandular process takes place in him at the thought. Like yeast rising...

links.title: Half Light: "An anger too, in addition to loneli..."
links.text: An anger too, in addition to loneliness.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Khm," the lieutenant coughs."
links.text: "Khm," the lieutenant coughs.

links.title: You: ""Khm..." (Cough.) "Moving on -- the..."
links.text: "Khm..." (Cough.) "Moving on -- the victim arrives some time after her..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""They moved into a deserted apartme..."
links.text: "They moved into a deserted apartment above the roundabout." He nods toward the city. "Radio equipment out for all to see -- reactionary radio playing. Sloppy and drunk."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I've seen their kind during the La..."
links.text: "I've seen their kind during the Landing. Those Occidental and Mesque falangues weren't conscripts -- boys, like us. They were wights. All they know is to destroy and hurt."

links.title: You: ""Wights?""
links.text: "Wights?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Barely alive. They like to kill wh..."
links.text: "Barely alive. They like to kill while they're on their drugs. After the landing, in the burning years I would take shots at them, *end* them. The worst ones. If I had a bullet to spare."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I could see they've returned now...."
links.text: "I could see they've returned now. To show their real face -- the face they don't dare show their bourgeois voters back on Mundi, with their families and polyester clothes..."

links.title: You: ""Got it.""
links.text: "Got it."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Herding the strikebreakers like th..."
links.text: "Herding the strikebreakers like that -- I kept an eye on them." He stares inland, then back at you.

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about something else fo..."
links.text: "Let's talk about something else for now."

links.title: The Deserter: "He draws shallow breaths."
links.text: He draws shallow breaths.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Joyce... he means Joyce."
links.text: Joyce... he means Joyce.

links.title: You: ""Rich hag?""
links.text: "Rich hag?"

links.title: You: ""By that you mean Joyce Messier, th..."
links.text: "By that you mean Joyce Messier, the Wild Pines rep?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Wrinkled up whore," he nods."
links.text: "Wrinkled up whore," he nods.

links.title: You: ""And by that you mean the represent..."
links.text: "And by that you mean the representative of the harbour company?"

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about something else fo..."
links.text: "Let's talk about something else for now."

links.title: The Deserter: "He draws shallow breaths."
links.text: He draws shallow breaths.

links.title: Logic: "That must be the representative of..."
links.text: That must be the representative of the Harbour company, who came in on her boat.

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: ""Them fucking..." He looks at the c..."
dialogueTree.text: "Them fucking..." He looks at the charred wood. "I didn't like that."

links.title: You: ""So you were jealous?""
links.text: "So you were jealous?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Jealousy is a reactionary concept...."
links.text: "Jealousy is a reactionary concept. I didn't *like* the reaver enjoying himself -- drugged out, soothed in the arms of a young woman. I wanted him to die so he could not enjoy life anymore."

links.title: Conceptualization: "For him to stop reacting to stimuli..."
links.text: For him to stop reacting to stimuli, to be broken off from the world. Cordoned into darkness.

links.title: The Deserter: ""And I wanted her to see his head e..."
links.text: "And I wanted her to see his head explode," he nods. "That too. She should know better than to hold a child murderer between her thighs. I knew he'd be there for one more second, *writhing*..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""That's all it takes for the bullet..."
links.text: "That's all it takes for the bullet to reach his head." He squints. "Now that I think of it, I wasn't aiming for his mouth. I wanted his brains to spill out on her... but..." he shrugs, "you can't have everything."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Her body sweating from the drugs, s..."
links.text: Her body sweating from the drugs, slick from cerebral haemorrhage.

links.title: Volition: "This man has seen past her, like yo..."
links.text: This man has seen past her, like you did.

links.title: Suggestion: "And now he longs to see her covered..."
links.text: And now he longs to see her covered in blood.

links.title: Suggestion: "He wants to see her covered in bloo..."
links.text: He wants to see her covered in blood.

links.title: Authority: "To punish her."
links.text: To punish her.

links.title: You: ""Did you leave the dried May bells..."
links.text: "Did you leave the dried May bells behind her window?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I did. I shouldn't have. It was a..."
links.text: "I did. I shouldn't have. It was a mistake..." A tremor passes the right side of his face.

links.title: You: ""Why did you?""
links.text: "Why did you?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I was there one night and she was..."
links.text: "I was there one night and she was crying. Like a child, in the corner of her room -- on the floor. I'd never seen her do that before."

links.title: You: ""When was this?""
links.text: "When was this?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""The day after I'd killed him.""
links.text: "The day after I'd killed him."

links.title: You: ""And you brought her May bells?""
links.text: "And you brought her May bells?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes," he looks at the charred logs..."
links.text: "Yes," he looks at the charred logs. "I don't know why I do the things I do anymore."

links.title: Volition: "It's as if something *put* the thou..."
links.text: It's as if something *put* the thought there. To leave the flowers.

links.title: You: ""You wanted to console her.""
links.text: "You wanted to console her."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Maybe..." He lowers his head and j..."
links.text: "Maybe..." He lowers his head and just stares at the logs. "I told you, I have holes in my brain now. I wouldn't just sit here waiting for you..."

links.title: Half Light: "A sudden pang of rage."
links.text: A sudden pang of rage.

links.title: The Deserter: ""If you came ten years ago, I would..."
links.text: "If you came ten years ago, I would have killed you." He wipes his eye.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Maybe..." He lowers his head and j..."
links.text: "Maybe..." He lowers his head and just stares at the logs. "I have these... holes in my brain now. I wouldn't just sit here waiting for you..."

links.title: You: ""You wanted to manipulate her.""
links.text: "You wanted to manipulate her."

links.title: You: ""Something *put* the thought in you..."
links.text: "Something *put* the thought in you. A compulsion."

links.title: The Deserter: ""What do you mean *put*?" He raises..."
links.text: "What do you mean *put*?" He raises his eyes. They're round and wide.

links.title: Empathy: "A brief flash of terror."
links.text: A brief flash of terror.

links.title: You: ""I just got this feeling. From what..."
links.text: "I just got this feeling. From what you said. Do you agree?"

links.title: You: ""Nothing.""
links.text: "Nothing."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I don't understand..." He shakes h..."
links.text: "I don't understand..." He shakes his head.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: The Deserter: "Neither does he. He lowers his head..."
links.text: Neither does he. He lowers his head, like a sunflower on a withered stalk.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "In the silence, the lieutenant draw..."
links.text: In the silence, the lieutenant draws a line in his notes. Then nods at you once more.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "One more down."
links.text: One more down.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "In the silence, the lieutenant draw..."
links.text: In the silence, the lieutenant draws a line in his notes.

links.title: You: ""How long had you been watching her?""
links.text: "How long had you been watching her?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Since she came to Martinaise. I sa..."
links.text: "Since she came to Martinaise. I saw her sneaking in the reeds early in the morning, behind the Feld building. It was dark, still winter. She didn't have her skimpy outfit on then, just a spot in the night, moving..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Past the Feld building, on the coa..."
links.text: "Past the Feld building, on the coast? What was she doing there?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Hiding something in the water. She..."
links.text: "Hiding something in the water. She had a fag after she'd done it. I was up in the ruins there -- she couldn't see me, but I could see her. Smoking... she was nervous, but not scared."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "And beautiful."
links.text: And beautiful.

links.title: You: ""And beautiful.""
links.text: "And beautiful."

links.title: The Deserter: ""That too," he nods."
links.text: "That too," he nods.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How could you see what she looked..."
links.text: "How could you see what she looked like? You said it was dark."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The sun came up, her hair was like..."
links.text: "The sun came up, her hair was like cobwebs. She smoked more fags and snorted a line of whatever shit she was on. Right there..." he shakes his head. "She needed it just to move."

links.title: The Deserter: ""The sun came up and her hair was l..."
links.text: "The sun came up and her hair was like cobwebs. She smoked more fags and snorted a line of whatever *shit* she was on. Right there..." he shakes his head. "She needed it just to move."

links.title: You: ""What do you think she hid there?""
links.text: "What do you think she hid there?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Her passport. And tickets to Villi..."
links.text: "Her passport. And tickets to Villiers." He coughs. "And from there to Casherbrume."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "In the Free State of Semenine. Hidd..."
links.text: In the Free State of Semenine. Hidden away at the edge of the Earth, near the pale.

links.title: You: ""This is the hidden buoy she told u..."
links.text: "This is the hidden buoy she told us about... You looked into it?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""After she was gone." He nods."
links.text: "After she was gone." He nods.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you keep what was in it? When..."
links.text: "Did you keep what was in it? When we found the submersible it was empty."

links.title: The Deserter: ""No. Why would I do that? I didn't..."
links.text: "No. Why would I do that? I didn't need tickets to Villiers... I put them back. If I wanted to extort someone I'd do better."

links.title: Rhetoric: "This implies that he's thought abou..."
links.text: This implies that he's thought about extorting her.

links.title: Logic: "Also, a little inconsistency here -..."
links.text: Also, a little inconsistency here -- he was surprised to hear her name Klaasje, before. Would he not have seen it on the documents?

links.title: Logic: "A little inconsistency -- he was su..."
links.text: A little inconsistency -- he was surprised to hear her name Klaasje, before. Would he not have seen it on the documents?

links.title: You: ""Did you keep the materials? When I..."
links.text: "Did you keep the materials? When I found the submersible it was empty."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you keep the documents in it?""
links.text: "Did you keep the documents in it?"

links.title: You: ""Did you keep the materials?""
links.text: "Did you keep the materials?"

links.title: You: ""Some kind of hidden container on t..."
links.text: "Some kind of hidden container on the coast? You looked into it?

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes. After she'd gone. It was a su..."
links.text: "Yes. After she'd gone. It was a submersible. Well made, actually..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sloppy, we should have gotten her..."
links.text: "Sloppy, we should have gotten her to tell us about this..." the lieutenant mutters to himself. "Did you take the documents?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""No. I put them back. Why would I t..."
links.text: "No. I put them back. Why would I take them, I'm not going to Falne..." He seems confused, momentarily. "Or... I mean..."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "One little thing -- what was her *n..."
links.text: One little thing -- what was her *name*, on the passport. Just curious...

links.title: You: ""Are you sure? I checked the submer..."
links.text: "Are you sure? I checked the submersible. There was nothing there."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Why would I need that trash?" He l..."
links.text: "Why would I need that trash?" He looks to the reeds, confused. "I'm not going to Villiers..."

links.title: Composure: "There it is again. The strange neur..."
links.text: There it is again. The strange neurological state he's sometimes in.

links.title: Composure: "A strange confusion comes over him..."
links.text: A strange confusion comes over him from time to time. Some kind of aberration of the nervous system?

links.title: You: ""Where was this submersible, looks..."
links.text: "Where was this submersible, looks like the investigation missed it?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""In the water, behind the camp site..."
links.text: "In the water, behind the camp site there," he waves erratically toward the coast. "I don't remember precisely. It was in the winter. It was cold out..."

links.title: You: ""You saw her name on the passport...."
links.text: "You saw her name on the passport. But before, when I said her name is *Klaasje* -- you didn't seem to recognize it."

links.title: The Deserter: ""It didn't say *Klaasje* in there....."
links.text: "It didn't say *Klaasje* in there..." He shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""What did it say her name was -- in..."
links.text: "What did it say her name was -- in the passport?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""It was something else..." He stutt..."
links.text: "It was something else..." He stutters. "I don't remember. It was dark that morning. I only remember her face on the photo."

links.title: You: ""Moving on -- did you continue watc..."
links.text: "Moving on -- did you continue watching her after this?" (Proceed.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""I did." He almost smiles. "She had..."
links.text: "I did." He almost smiles. "She had a face like an archipelago, with those birthmarks. And a body, hard and lean and bruised all over -- black and yellow. I could see she's taken a beating."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I could see who she was, too," he..."
links.text: "I could see who she was, too," he nods. "A spook. On the run. Revachol's the cloaca of capital now. All the bagmen and arms dealers end up here. To do drugs and have sex like animals."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You could tell she was a *spook* f..."
links.text: "You could tell she was a *spook* from the documents?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""She had different colour hair on t..."
links.text: "She had different colour hair on the photo, and glasses. *Forged*. Some sordid, bourgeois affair. I've heard about this kind of thing on the radio..."

links.title: Drama: "He's setting it up for you..."
links.text: He's setting it up for you...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The bruises. You can't make that ou..."
links.text: The bruises. You can't make that out in a scope...

links.title: You: ""And you could see her bruises -- t..."
links.text: "And you could see her bruises -- through the scope of a rifle?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""You can't see bruises through a sc..."
links.text: "You can't see bruises through a scope. It's just a blur..." He shakes his silver-grey head.

links.title: You: ""How did you see all this. The brui..."
links.text: "How did you see all this. The bruises; that she was beaten?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I'm not blind, am I?" He shakes hi..."
links.text: "I'm not blind, am I?" He shakes his silver head.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The bruises. Can you make that out..."
links.text: The bruises. Can you make that out in a scope?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "And the fact that she was a *spook*..."
links.text: And the fact that she was a *spook*. How did he come to that?

links.title: You: ""First -- you could tell she was a..."
links.text: "First -- you could tell she was a *spook* from the documents?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""She had different colour hair on t..."
links.text: "She had different colour hair on the photo -- and glasses. *Forged*. Some sort of sordid, bourgeois affair. I've heard about this kind of thing on the radio..."

links.title: You: ""And the bruises -- you could see h..."
links.text: "And the bruises -- you could see her bruises through the scope of a rifle?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""You can't see that through a scope..."
links.text: "You can't see that through a scope. It's just a blur there..." He shakes his silver-grey head.

links.title: You: ""How did you see all this. The brui..."
links.text: "How did you see all this. The bruises, that she was beaten?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Heh..." He shakes his silver-grey..."
links.text: "Heh..." He shakes his silver-grey head.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wait, she was a *spook*? How did he..."
links.text: Wait, she was a *spook*? How did he come to that?

links.title: You: ""Did you take the documents?""
links.text: "Did you take the documents?"

links.title: You: ""What was she doing there?""
links.text: "What was she doing there?"

links.title: You: "How does he know those minute detai..."
links.text: How does he know those minute details about her body?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "It quickly comes to you."
links.text: It quickly comes to you.

links.title: You: ""The bruises on her body -- any cha..."
links.text: "The bruises on her body -- any chance you've seen them through a *hole in a wall?*"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I've seen her like that, yes," he..."
links.text: "I've seen her like that, yes," he nods. "Cutting those drugs of hers into little lines with a knife, masturbating..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Everything in him fills with imposs..."
links.text: Everything in him fills with impossible longing, all at once.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you make that hole?""
links.text: "Did you make that hole?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""With a clip point knife.""
links.text: "With a clip point knife."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Good for listening in too. For hear..."
links.text: Good for listening in too. For hearing the moaning and the snorts.

links.title: You: ""You made that hole?""
links.text: "You made that hole?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Oh yes," he smacks his lips. "Cutt..."
links.text: "Oh yes," he smacks his lips. "Cutting those drugs of hers into little lines with a knife, masturbating..."

links.title: You: ""Ever see her through a window, on..."
links.text: "Ever see her through a window, on a roof?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Like that too, yes," he nods. "Ben..."
links.text: "Like that too, yes," he nods. "Bending like a bow against the glass..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Mhm," he smacks his lips. "Bending..."
links.text: "Mhm," he smacks his lips. "Bending like a bow against the glass..."

links.title: You: ""You've been through the secret rou..."
links.text: "You've been through the secret route behind the Whirling-in-Rags." (Move on.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""I've been through *all* of Martina..."
links.text: "I've been through *all* of Martinaise -- every nook and cranny."

links.title: You: ""And that too.""
links.text: "And that too."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes, that too." He shakes his head..."
links.text: "Yes, that too." He shakes his head, almost in awe. "The things they did in that little room. What she'd *do* to feel good..." He explains: "Funny, the way light works..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You turn it on inside and it gets..."
links.text: "You turn it on inside and it gets so dark out you can't see a man looking in. I learned that in the Twenties when they were still hunting me. I've seen people do *some* shit, but..." He keeps shaking his head.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Those two took the cake."
links.text: Those two took the cake.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You hear the familiar scribble of t..."
links.text: You hear the familiar scribble of the lieutenant's pen. A quick glance at you...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "One more loose end down. We're doin..."
links.text: One more loose end down. We're doing this, detective.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "... then at the man. "How did you g..."
links.text: ... then at the man. "How did you get in there? The hidden pinball workshop?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I can just walk in there now, afte..."
links.text: "I can just walk in there now, after a good wash -- I told you they think I'm an antisocial. Closing hour is a good time. The kitchen's empty."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You had to open the steel door in..."
links.text: "You had to open the steel door in the kitchen? How?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I got that open a long time ago. S..."
links.text: "I got that open a long time ago. Some bourgeois game-merchant lived there -- I don't know... fifteen years ago? He left spare keys all over and I took one. Then I saw her turn the light on one night in my scope..." He points toward the Whirling-in-Rags.

links.title: Interfacing: "And he found use for it -- a spare..."
links.text: And he found use for it -- a spare key, like the one hanging behind the Union box window.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""One more thing -- the flowers, Mr...."
links.text: "One more thing -- the flowers, Mr. Dros. The dried flowers that were on the roof."

links.title: The Deserter: ""What about them?""
links.text: "What about them?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "There! He's already admitted to it!..."
links.text: There! He's already admitted to it! Just ask...

links.title: You: ""One more thing, Mr. Dros -- the dr..."
links.text: "One more thing, Mr. Dros -- the dried flowers. On the roof."

links.title: You: ""One more thing about her...""
links.text: "One more thing about her..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""That fucking whore..." He waves hi..."
links.text: "That fucking whore..." He waves his hand, with sudden anger. Something comes over him...

links.title: Half Light: "A strange, uncalled for rage he see..."
links.text: A strange, uncalled for rage he seems to have no control over.

links.title: You: ""And the door? The steel door in th..."
links.text: "And the door? The steel door in the kitchen, how do you open that?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I can just walk in the hostel now,..."
links.text: "I can just walk in the hostel now, after a good wash. They all think I'm an antisocial, a vagrant. Closing hour is a good time. The kitchen's empty then."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah." Cuno nods knowingly. "The l..."
links.text: "Yeah." Cuno nods knowingly. "The lightning gets shit going. Speedfreaks fuckin' in the bushes..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "He must knows his way around a crea..."
links.text: He must knows his way around a creaky floorboard and a rusty hinge on a door...

links.title: You: ""How did you get *in* there? The hi..."
links.text: "How did you get *in* there? The hidden pinball workshop?"

links.title: You: ""You've been through the secret rou..."
links.text: "You've been through the secret route behind the Whirling-in-Rags." (Move on.)

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He must have... climbed to the roof..."
links.text: He must have... climbed to the roof maybe?

links.title: You: ""How did you get close enough to se..."
links.text: "How did you get close enough to see her bruises, Mr. Dros?"

links.title: You: ""You climbed, right? You *climbed*..."
links.text: "You climbed, right? You *climbed* behind her window?"

links.title: You: ""You climbed, right? You *climbed*..."
links.text: "You climbed, right? You *climbed* behind her window, like the CRAB-MAN?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""What are you talking about -- 'cra..."
links.text: "What are you talking about -- 'crab-man'?" He waves you off with a cough.

links.title: You: ""How good are those fucking eyes of..."
links.text: "How good are those fucking eyes of yours -- you use binoculars?"

links.title: You: ""How did you get close enough to se..."
links.text: "How did you get close enough to see the bruises, Mr. Dros?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I have my ways." A cracked smile a..."
links.text: "I have my ways." A cracked smile appears on his dried white lips.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've been through the secret rou..."
links.text: "You've been through the secret route behind the Whirling-in-Rags." The lieutenant interrupts.

links.title: The Deserter: ""I've been through *all* of Martina..."
links.text: "I've been through *all* of Martinaise -- every nook and cranny."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Thank god, the lieutenant is pickin..."
links.text: Thank god, the lieutenant is picking it up...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But *that* nook too?" The lieutena..."
links.text: "But *that* nook too?" The lieutenant does not let you finish.

links.title: You: ""What *ways*? Tell me!""
links.text: "What *ways*? Tell me!"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Not in this lifetime droite." He w..."
links.text: "Not in this lifetime droite." He waves you off with a cough, his thoughts elsewhere...

links.title: Empathy: "On her."
links.text: On her.

links.title: Logic: "This one's *gone*. Make up somehow,..."
links.text: This one's *gone*. Make up somehow, connect something else, fast!

links.title: Inland Empire: "You lost it..."
links.text: You lost it...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You're a bad detective. Lazy and ba..."
links.text: You're a bad detective. Lazy and bad.

links.title: You: "One little thing missed and I drown..."
links.text: One little thing missed and I drown in anxiety...

links.title: Logic: "Rightly so. Fix this now! Push on,..."
links.text: Rightly so. Fix this now! Push on, extra carefully!

links.title: Inland Empire: "Dive for other clues now, like you..."
links.text: Dive for other clues now, like you always do. Make it up in the deep end...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "As you should be, son, this is piti..."
links.text: As you should be, son, this is pitiful. Make up for it now!

links.title: You: "No. It's cool. I've already got him..."
links.text: No. It's cool. I've already got him. I don't need to be perfect.

links.title: Logic: "No it's not. Fix this now! Move on..."
links.text: No it's not. Fix this now! Move on extra carefully! Be incredibly *minute*!

links.title: Inland Empire: "Is it? You don't feel like it is. Y..."
links.text: Is it? You don't feel like it is. You feel like you should make up for it by *scrutinizing* him extra carefully...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Of course it's not *okay*. Make up..."
links.text: Of course it's not *okay*. Make up for it now, maximum performance!

links.title: You: ""Another question about her.""
links.text: "Another question about her."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Her..." he repeats, with strange s..."
links.text: "Her..." he repeats, with strange slowness.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "A little pain there. A prick."
links.text: A little pain there. A prick.

links.title: Cuno: ""You've been through some secret ro..."
links.text: "You've been through some secret route shit, huh? *Inside* the Whirling-in-Rags, creepin' around?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I've been through *all* of Martina..."
links.text: "I've been through *all* of Martinaise -- every nook and cranny."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Thank god, the kid is picking it up..."
links.text: Thank god, the kid is picking it up...

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, but that one too, right? Sec..."
links.text: "Yeah, but that one too, right? Secret Whirling shit?"

links.title: You: ""You wanted to punish her, so you k..."
links.text: "You wanted to punish her, so you killed him."

links.title: The Deserter: ""She practically breastfed that man..."
links.text: "She practically breastfed that man. You wouldn't believe the things she let him do to her..." He shakes his head and stares at the ashes.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You stare at them too. In your mind..."
links.text: You stare at them too. In your mind, Her Innocence Dei still turns to leave, airport bag in hand, silks flowing in her wake...

links.title: You: "The dream..."
links.text: The dream...

links.title: Inland Empire: "See you tomorrow, Harry. Her voice..."
links.text: See you tomorrow, Harry. Her voice rings in the evening air, burning...

links.title: You: "This has got nothing to do with tha..."
links.text: This has got nothing to do with that. (Try to forget it.)

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's no good, Harry. Her voice ring..."
links.text: It's no good, Harry. Her voice rings in the evening air. It smells of burning buildings...

links.title: Empathy: "While he stands here and rots."
links.text: While he stands here and rots.

links.title: You: ""You saw through her? So did I.""
links.text: "You saw through her? So did I."

links.title: The Deserter: ""You're delusional. There's nothing..."
links.text: "You're delusional. There's nothing to *see* in the soul of the bourgeois woman. It's the same as the surface -- sick hedonism and desperation."

links.title: You: ""She did deserve a good punishing.""
links.text: "She did deserve a good punishing."

links.title: The Deserter: "He nods. "Made a little love-nest u..."
links.text: He nods. "Made a little love-nest up there. Sweaty linen and bottles they would use for god knows what... I saw other men there too, but I can't be sure. Even a woman once."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A red haired woman? Ruby...""
links.text: "A red haired woman? Ruby..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""That kind of thing is fine by the..."
links.text: "That kind of thing is fine by the Party so it's fine by me, but it goes to show you..." He just shakes his head.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Seems like the answer was yes."
links.text: Seems like the answer was yes.

links.title: You: ""A red haired woman? Ruby...""
links.text: "A red haired woman? Ruby..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""That kind of thing is fine by the..."
links.text: "That kind of thing is fine by the Party so it's fine by me. But it goes to show you..." He just shakes his head.

links.title: You: "Let it be."
links.text: Let it be.

links.title: You: ""I hate women too, you know.""
links.text: "I hate women too, you know."

links.title: The Deserter: ""True, there is something bourgeois..."
links.text: "True, there is something bourgeois about women..." He nods. "The weak are more vulnerable to exploitation by capital, unless they rise up in arms, which the likes of her..." He shakes his head.

links.title: The Deserter: ""*Twisted* by psychopharmaceuticals..."
links.text: "*Twisted* by psychopharmaceuticals, alcohol, and the class interests of the bourgeoisie. They all are -- women nowadays..." He raises his eyes from the ashes.

links.title: You: ""I'm not like that. I don't think l..."
links.text: "I'm not like that. I don't think like that."

links.title: The Deserter: ""No one gives a *shit* what you thi..."
links.text: "No one gives a *shit* what you think," the old man spits in the ash. "You and your cronies kill ten working class men a day. I've heard the statistics on Channel 8."

links.title: You: ""Men are insane." (Shake your head...."
links.text: "Men are insane." (Shake your head.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""The world is insane..." He raises..."
links.text: "The world is insane..." He raises his gaze. Something glimmers in there. Then it's gone.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man raises his gaze. Someth..."
links.text: The old man raises his gaze. Something glimmers in the corner of his black eye...

links.title: Empathy: "A bitter taste on his tongue."
links.text: A bitter taste on his tongue.

links.title: You: ""Did you have feelings for that wom..."
links.text: "Did you have feelings for that woman?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""There's..." he sighs, "there's not..."
links.text: "There's..." he sighs, "there's nothing to hold on to, only this... It's not enough."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The coals of his eyes glisten sudde..."
links.text: The coals of his eyes glisten suddenly, like stones dripping with water. Is he crying?

links.title: The Deserter: ""Man needs to feel something else...."
links.text: "Man needs to feel something else. In this fight, it helps if you have your eye on something there," he looks to the city. "It's weakness, I know."

links.title: You: ""There have been others?""
links.text: "There have been others?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Yes. Over the years. It's not un-p..."
links.text: "Yes. Over the years. It's not un-proletarian to feel something."

links.title: You: ""Was that why you left the dried fl..."
links.text: "Was that why you left the dried flowers behind her window?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""No..." He starts to shake his head..."
links.text: "No..." He starts to shake his head again, a sunflower on a withered stalk.

links.title: You: ""Why then?""
links.text: "Why then?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I don't really know. I was there o..."
links.text: "I don't really know. I was there one night and she was crying, like a child -- in the corner of her room, on the floor. Like she does sometimes...."

links.title: You: ""One more thing about this woman...""
links.text: "One more thing about this woman..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Woman..." he smiles suddenly."
links.text: "Woman..." he smiles suddenly.

links.title: Composure: "And inexplicably. It doesn't go wit..."
links.text: And inexplicably. It doesn't go with his pained voice.

links.title: You: ""So in conclusion, it wasn't about..."
links.text: "So in conclusion, it wasn't about him. It was about *her*." (Conclude.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""Her..." He repeats, staring at the..."
links.text: "Her..." He repeats, staring at the ashes -- then the reeds. There's a twitch in the corner of his eye.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear a low frequency hiss, bare..."
links.text: You hear a low frequency hiss, barely. Beneath the audible spectrum. Then it's gone.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods at you, in ackn..."
links.text: The lieutenant nods at you, in acknowledgement.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "That's it. Motive. We have it."
links.text: That's it. Motive. We have it.

links.title: Cuno: ""It was about bitches." The boy nod..."
links.text: "It was about bitches." The boy nods grimly.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "There -- motive, detective. We have..."
links.text: There -- motive, detective. We have it.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Her..." He repeats, staring at the..."
links.text: "Her..." He repeats, staring at the ashes -- then at the reeds. There's a twitch in the corner of his eye.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear a low frequency hiss, bare..."
links.text: You hear a low frequency hiss, barely beneath the audible spectrum. Then it's gone.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Where is she?" The old man looks a..."
links.text: "Where is she?" The old man looks at you. "I haven't seen her there for days."

links.title: You: ""She got away. I don't know where s..."
links.text: "She got away. I don't know where she is."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Good for her..." He looks to the c..."
links.text: "Good for her..." He looks to the city and nods: "That girl kept staring into the scope, you know -- in the end. This last week, kept staring at the island..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""At night, crying or smoking on the..."
links.text: "At night, crying or smoking on the roof. Like she knew I was here..." He says to no one in particular: "It doesn't matter."

links.title: Shivers: "Across the harbour, on the banks of..."
links.text: Across the harbour, on the banks of the River Esperance, cold rain falls on Precinct 57 -- a two story box of duraluminum near the gates to Terminal H.

links.title: You: "Look east..."
links.text: Look east...

links.title: Shivers: "Inside, in a cell, a young woman is..."
links.text: Inside, in a cell, a young woman is withdrawing from amphetamines, barbiturates and alcohol. All at once. While two men in brown suits wave ICP badges at a young policeman. She hears the door open...

links.title: Shivers: "...and knows it's over. They've com..."
links.text: ...and knows it's over. They've come for her. Outside the dusk gathers, the river  flows by, gold and orange into the Bay of Martinaise.

links.title: Shivers: "...and knows it's over. They've com..."
links.text: ...and knows it's over. They've come for her. Outside night falls, the river flows by, treacle black into the Bay of Martinaise.

links.title: Shivers: "...and knows it's over. They've com..."
links.text: ...and knows it's over. They've come for her. Outside it's springtime, the river  flows blue and green into the Bay of Martinaise.

links.title: You: "Shake it off."
links.text: Shake it off.

links.title: Shivers: "Inside, in a cell, a young woman is..."
links.text: Inside, in a cell, a young woman is withdrawing from amphetamines, barbiturates and alcohol. Shivering, she fades from your mind's eye...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "There, on a dilapidated jetty in a..."
links.text: There, on a dilapidated jetty in a nameless village, two police officers and one special consultant look across a narrow strip of sea. The ruins of a seafort stick out of the water, built by Filippe II, re-appropriated by the Commune, then lost in the Landing...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: ""He's there, doing... *what* exactl..."
links.text: "He's there, doing... *what* exactly I don't know," Satellite-Officer Vicquemare points at the ruins. "Behind that anti-aircraft-something. That's why we can't see him."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Special consultant  Heidelstam is o..."
links.text: Special consultant  Heidelstam is optimistic: "We'll see the boat when he comes. Let's go get a coffee until then. I know this interesting little place, where..." His voice trails off as the three walk down the jetty.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "As the men go, Patrol Officer Minot..."
links.text: As the men go, Patrol Officer Minot looks back over her shoulder -- at the crumbling fortification in the rain, like a rotten tooth rising out of the water...

links.title: Empathy: "Good luck, Harry, she thinks. You n..."
links.text: Good luck, Harry, she thinks. You need something *good* for this...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "As the men go, Patrol Officer Minot..."
links.text: As the men go, Patrol Officer Minot looks back over her shoulder -- at the crumbling fortification in the snowfall, like a rotten tooth rising out of the water...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "As the men go, Patrol Officer Minot..."
links.text: As the men go, Patrol Officer Minot looks back over her shoulder -- at the crumbling fortification, like a rotten tooth rising out of the water...

links.title: Rhetoric: "He knew she knows. She was looking..."
links.text: He knew she knows. She was looking at the island, figuring it out -- day by day, cigarette by cigarette...

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man has fallen silent, star..."
links.text: The old man has fallen silent, staring at your feet. The burnt logs in the fire are moist from the sea air.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We could get more..." the lieutena..."
links.text: "We could get more..." the lieutenant uses the opportunity to tell you -- in a lowered voice. "We've got him talking..."

links.title: Logic: "Who knows what he's seen and done o..."
links.text: Who knows what he's seen and done over the years?

links.title: Suggestion: "You could get more out of him... He..."
links.text: You could get more out of him... He likes talking.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "*Enough*. Take him in. Bend his arm..."
links.text: *Enough*. Take him in. Bend his arms behind his back and end this.

links.title: Cuno: ""We can totally get more out of him..."
links.text: "We can totally get more out of him..." the kid whispers. "He's squeelin'..."

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man falls silent. Staring a..."
links.text: The old man falls silent. Staring at your feet, the burnt logs.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Across the water, on a dilapidated..."
links.text: Across the water, on a dilapidated jetty in a nameless village -- made of grey cinder block houses with eternite roofs -- two police officers and one special consultant look across a narrow strip of sea.

links.title: Shivers: "Across the harbour, on the South ba..."
links.text: Across the harbour, on the South bank of the River Esperance, white snow falls on a two story box of duraluminum. Precinct 57, near the gates to Terminal H.

links.title: Shivers: "Across the harbour, on the South ba..."
links.text: Across the harbour, on the South bank of the River Esperance, the air stands still outside Precinct 57 -- a two story box of duraluminum near the gates to Terminal H.

links.title: Shivers: "Midtown, across the bay of Revachol..."
links.text: Midtown, across the bay of Revachol. Cold rain falls on forty-story towers. Above them -- Lausanne Central Aerodrome; a cocoon suspended in the grey sky by a web of suspension wiring, encircled by hybrid aircraft.

links.title: You: "Look north..."
links.text: Look north...

links.title: Shivers: "On the platform a young woman is wi..."
links.text: On the platform a young woman is withdrawing from amphetamines, barbiturates and alcohol. Yet still she smiles among the crowd, among the great ghost of the city she's leaving -- for another, far south.

links.title: Shivers: "Smaller. Distant. Hidden. Not like..."
links.text: Smaller. Distant. Hidden. Not like the great chandelier she sees sparkle in the dusk below her. Streets, towers, tenements and cold water; and across the water -- a dark strip of ruins barely visible, if she didn't squint her eyes...

links.title: Shivers: "Good bye, Martinaise."
links.text: Good bye, Martinaise.

links.title: Shivers: "Smaller. Distant. Hidden. Not like..."
links.text: Smaller. Distant. Hidden. Not like the great chandelier she sees sparkle in the night below her. Street lights, towers, tenements and water -- and across it, a dark strip of ruins barely visible, if she didn't squint her eyes...

links.title: Shivers: "Smaller. Distant. Hidden. Not like..."
links.text: Smaller. Distant. Hidden. Not like the great chandelier she sees sparkle in the spring air below her. Streets and towers, tenements and water -- and across it, a dark strip of ruins barely visible, if she didn't squint her eyes...

links.title: You: "Shake it off."
links.text: Shake it off.

links.title: Shivers: "On the platform a young woman is wi..."
links.text: On the platform a young woman is withdrawing from amphetamines, barbiturates and alcohol. Yet still she smiles among the crowd, fading from your mind's eye...

links.title: Shivers: "Midtown, across the bay of Revachol..."
links.text: Midtown, across the bay of Revachol. Snow falls on forty-story towers. Above them -- Lausanne Central Aerodrome; a cocoon suspended in the snowy sky by a web of suspension wiring, encircled by hybrid aircraft.

links.title: Shivers: "Midtown, across the bay of Revachol..."
links.text: Midtown, across the bay of Revachol. The oceanic wind washes forty-story towers. Above them -- Lausanne Central Aerodrome; a cocoon suspended in the sky by a web of suspension wiring, encircled by hybrid aircraft.

links.title: You: ""She got away, but she led me here..."
links.text: "She got away, but she led me here first. She figured out someone was watching her from the seafort."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Gone..." He looks to the city and..."
links.text: "Gone..." He looks to the city and nods: "I knew it. She kept staring into the scope this last week. At the island, like she knew...." He sighs.

links.title: The Deserter: ""She'd look -- at night, crying or..."
links.text: "She'd look -- at night, crying or smoking on the roof -- staring right into me..." He adds, to no one in particular: "It doesn't matter."

links.title: You: ""I arrested her." (Lie.)"
links.text: "I arrested her." (Lie.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""Locked up with your masters, like..."
links.text: "Locked up with your masters, like I'll be... maybe we'll meet?" He looks to the city. "She kept staring into the scope, you know -- in the end. Like she *knew*."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Staring at the island, the fort, l..."
links.text: "Staring at the island, the fort, like she knew I was here..." He adds, to no one in particular: "It doesn't matter."

links.title: You: ""I arrested her.""
links.text: "I arrested her."

links.title: You: ""I am not at liberty to say.""
links.text: "I am not at liberty to say."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I know she's gone." He looks to th..."
links.text: "I know she's gone." He looks to the city. "Locked up, or on the run.... She kept staring into the scope, you know. In the end, this last week. At the fort. Like she *knew*."

links.title: The Deserter: ""Like she *knew* I was here..." He..."
links.text: "Like she *knew* I was here..." He adds, to no one in particular: "It doesn't matter."

links.title: Drama: "Safe and sound, sire. Surely you ha..."
links.text: Safe and sound, sire. Surely you have not misplaced the witness.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The calibre of bullet he used does..."
links.text: The calibre of bullet he used does not do that kind of damage.

links.title: You: ""Okay then.""
links.text: "Okay then."

links.title: The Deserter: "*Splat*, a bloody spitball lands on..."
links.text: *Splat*, a bloody spitball lands on the firewood.
